incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Start time : 10/05/2023 08:00 UTC End time : 10/05/2023 09:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will carry out an electrical maintenance on rack W16A18

Start time : 10/05/2023 13:01 UTC End time : 10/05/2023 19:01 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Our teams will perform a scalable maintenance operation on our high voltage electrical distribution equipment.
Start time : 10/05/2023 23:30 UTC End time : 11/05/2023 00:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Our team must correct the direction of the air flow inside the switch.

Start time : 11/05/2023 05:00 UTC End time : 11/05/2023 06:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need replace an equipment related to the cooling system.

Start time : 11/05/2023 05:30 UTC End time : 11/05/2023 07:30 UTC Service impact : Servers in rack W16B19 will be unreachable during the maintenance Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance on our water cooling system.

Start time : 11/05/2023 08:00 UTC End time : 11/05/2023 12:00 UTC Service impact : You may experience increased latency and packet loss. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on multiple network equipement.

Start time : 11/05/2023 08:00 UTC End time : 11/05/2023 14:00 UTC Service impact : You may experience increased latency to communicate with your services behind this device. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams are going to upgrade a network equipment.

Start time : 11/05/2023 08:00 UTC End time : 11/05/2023 12:00 UTC Service impact : You may experience increased latency and packet loss. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be add capacity on backbone infrastructure between HIL and PDX.

Start time : 12/05/2023 01:00 UTC End time : 12/05/2023 11:00 UTC Service impact : Loss of management IPs only on N5 down switchs for about 3 minutes. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be upgrading some network devices.

Summary : We are going to intervene in the rack to replace a large number of power supply cables that could have an insulation defect. Actions : Replacement of the C13/C14 power supply cables of the rack Start of intervention : 12/05/2023 06:00 UTC Rack : R803R02 Impact : Server outage during the intervention. Duration of intervention : 06h00
